attributes.action: Tax relief for keyworkers for 3 months  - Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Keyworkers are working through this difficult time putting themselves and their families at risk. All other non essential workers are not working, they are staying home and getting 80% of their wages to help them. Keyworkers deserve some recognition for the essential jobs that they do, I feel the government can show their appreciation by allowing these workers to have tax relief during this period.
attributes.background: Give the keyworkers who are working through this pandemic, tax relief for at least 3 months whilst this is ongoing.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
